locationSection.intro: Centro is the vibrant heart of Jávea Xàbia, offering the perfect balance between coastal living and convenient access to essential services. This prestigious neighborhood attracts international buyers seeking authentic Mediterranean charm combined with modern conveniences. The area is characterized by its proximity to stunning Blue Flag beaches, world-class golf facilities, and established expat communities where English is widely spoken. Centro benefits from excellent infrastructure including regional healthcare facilities, international schools, and diverse shopping options. The neighborhood's strategic location provides easy access to Alicante Airport while maintaining a relaxed, village-like atmosphere that defines the Costa Blanca lifestyle. Property values in Centro have shown consistent growth of +8% year-on-year, reflecting strong investor confidence and sustained demand from both European buyers and holidaymakers.
